name: Tiff2djvu
tagline: Convert multiple tiff/tif images to a single DJVU file
body:
# TIFF2DJVU
This software is used to convert and merge multiple TIFF files to a single DJVU file.
Operating system : Ubuntu
Prerequisite packages : libtiff-tools, pdftk and pdf2djvu
## Usage Instructions Clone the repo to local machine (or Download the tiff2djvu.py file) and run the python file using "python tiff2djvu.py" in the terminal. This software is licensed under GPL v3, whose documentation is given along with this software. Copyright (c) 2012 Balasankar C Special Thanks : Hrishikesh K B (stultus) and Manoj K Mohan
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
